title: Jon Lord & Tony Ashton - First Of The Big Bands (1974) @192kbps
description:
Jon Lord & Tony Ashton - First Of The Big Bands (1974) @192kbps

A wonderful early album from Deep Purple's Jon Lord and Tony Ashton, released 1974 and rereleased on cd 1988.

Tony Ashton died from cancer on 28 May 2001 at his home. He was 55. Shortly before he sent this message:

Dear everyone,
Thanks for all the messages and enquiries -
recent tests show the cancer has spread
and I've decided to refuse further treatment and come home.
So - thanks to all, have a drink for me - cheers and bollox...
- Tony Ashton.

Enjoy this fine album and please seed :-)

Track List:

01 - We're Gonna Make It
02 - Downside Upside Down
03 - Band Of The Salvation Army Band
04 - Silly Boy
05 - Surrender Me
06 - Celebration
07 - I Been Lonely
08 - Shut Up
09 - Ballad Of Mr. Giver
